short.am,ar,bn,ca,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,e: Send audio and video streams directly to the well-known VLC™ media player * (Requires native client download)
short.bg: Изпращане на аудио и видео потоци директно към добре познатия медиен плейър VLC™ * (Requires native client download)
short.cs: Odesílání audio a video streamů přímo do známého multimediálního přehrávače VLC™ * (Requires native client download)
short.da: Audio- und Videostreams direkt an den bekannten VLC™ Media Player senden * (Requires native client download)
short.el: Αποστολή ροών ήχου και βίντεο απευθείας στο γνωστό πρόγραμμα αναπαραγωγής πολυμέσων VLC™ * (Requires native client download)
short.et: Saate heli- ja videovooge otse tuntud VLC™ meediapleierisse * (Requires native client download)
short.fi: Lähetä ääni- ja videovirrat suoraan tunnettuun VLC™-mediasoittimeen.
short.fr: Envoyez des flux audio et vidéo directement sur le célèbre lecteur multimédia VLC™. *( Nécessite le téléchargement du client natif)
short.hu: Hang- és videófolyamokat küldhet közvetlenül a jól ismert VLC™ médialejátszóba.
short.it: Invia flussi audio e video direttamente al noto lettore multimediale VLC
short.ja: オーディオやビデオのストリームを著名なVLC™メディアプレーヤーに直接送信する
short.nl: Stuur audio- en videostreams rechtstreeks naar de bekende VLC™ mediaspeler * (Requires native client download)
short.zh_CN: 将音频和视频流直接发送到著名的VLC™媒体播放器上

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send media stream links from current tab to VLC MEDIA PLAYER
This extension observes network activity and offers "send-to-VLC" functionality when a streamable media is detected. This way you can watch media streams in your VLC media player instead of the built-in media player and use the power of VLC for watching or listening to media sources.
* Requires native client download
